ygData.subject: Re: Starting smithing...
ygData.msgSnippet: You will have problems being a Blacksmith because you start in Halas.  The pieces of ore that you need to make metal bits which are the most basic thing that
ygData.messageBody:
You will have problems being a Blacksmith because you start in Halas. The
pieces of ore that you need to make "metal bits" which are the most basic
thing that you can make, are not availiable on your side of the continient.
With an intelligence of 60, you will take longer to gain skill points, but
it is still possible. I still find it strange that ore is not availiable
in Halas, a town and a race of people that would be perfect Blacksmiths.


Tanaman-<Aradani>
14th Lev. Paladin
Veeshan Server
